text: Is it possible to CREATE EMAIL TEMPLATES via API? I see the docs regarding sending, getting template list, but I can't seem to find the API to create an email template. Need some guidance please.
You can use this API endpoint and specify `category_id` as 2
You can also create the individual marketing emails using the new Marketing Email API  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/lists/marketing-email-overview>
